agentReply: Hi Diyali, sorry to hear you had trouble logging in and experienced issues with OTP verification. We're working on improving our login process. We appreciate your feedback on our app content and will pass it along to our copywriter. Please reach out to hello@craveo.co.in for assistance. Drop us a DM on Instagram (@craveohq) to get beta access!
